original_text: If someone has done bad things against you, do not do bad things back to them. Try to live in a good way so that people will respect you. They will see that you do good things.
korean_text: 아무에게도 악을 악으로 갚지 말고 모든 사람 앞에서 선한 일을 도모하라

sentences.korean_translation: 만약 누군가가 당신에게 나쁜 일을 했다면
